update.description:
The logged in user name is displayed in the toolbar on the right. 

The screenshot icon and log-record icon have been moved to the left 

![login_status.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3547058655-login_status.png)

To manually test this:

1. follow instructions in rest-web plugin test [readme](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/40c4a2f966533a8dce6d085e5e346a9dcc99adf9/test/plugins/rest-web/readme.txt?at=rest_login_status&fileviewer=file-view-default) file and install the rest server. 

1. Launch gzserver and gzclient using the scripts in the folder

1. log in via the REST-web menu in the menubar with the credentials: `myuser` / `mypass`

1. the username should appear on the right side of the toolbar


jenkins [no gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/792/) - 1 style error and fixed in 40c4a2f
update.title: Update REST plugin to display login username

pull_request.title: Update REST plugin to display login username

pullrequest.title: Update REST plugin to display login username

content.raw:
I'm still a bit worried about this.  I was just looking at some tutorials which have screenshots of the icons on the right. A recent [pull request](#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/pull-requests/252/update-screenshot-tutorial/diff) actually changed the screenshot to show the icon on the right. 

Do we really want to change the icon position because of a plugin? Would it be too difficult to push the icons to the left only when this plugin is being used? I can help with this. Maybe inserting the login label with a spacer in front of it?
content.html:
I'm still a bit worried about this. I was just looking at some tutorials which have screenshots of the icons on the right. A recent pull request actually changed the screenshot to show the icon on the right.

Do we really want to change the icon position because of a plugin? Would it be too difficult to push the icons to the left only when this plugin is being used? I can help with this. Maybe inserting the login label with a spacer in front of it?
